name: Chest
description: Chest is a UK fintech app helping Millennials and Gen Z save for retirement in simple, visible, and effortless ways. Through cashback, round-ups, and pension consolidation, Chest makes saving for the future engaging and rewarding.
mission: To make pensions work for a new generation by turning everyday spending into long-term savings.
features: Automated saving rules (round-ups, pound-ups, no-spend challenges)
Chest Score – a single metric showing retirement readiness
target_audience: UK Millennials and Gen Z (ages 22–40) who want to grow their pension in smarter, easier ways.
